item.title: US-95 North at I-11/US-93
item.description: US-95 North at I-11/US-93 (Exit 14) in Boulder City. Merge right for I-11/US-93/US-95 north onramp. US-95 joins US-93 north to I-15 in Las Vegas.

item.title: US-95 North at I-11/US-93/NV-173
item.description: US-95 North at I-11/US-93/US-95 North/Henderson/Las Vegas. Continue north for NV-173 to Bus. US-93/Boulder City.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching I-11/US-93
item.description: US-95 North approaching I-11/US-93 in Boulder City.

item.title: End NV-173 South at I-11/US-93/US-95 North
item.description: End NV-173 South at I-11/US-93/US-95 North (Exit 14) onramp. Roadway turns into US-95 southbound.

item.title: End NV-173 South at I-11/US-93/US-95
item.description: End NV-173 South at I-11/US-93/US-95 in Boulder City. Use I-11/US-93/US-95 north for Las Vegas; use I-11/US-93 South for Kingman (Arizona); use US-95 south for Searchlight.

item.title: Begin NV-173 South - Boulder City
item.description: Begin NV-173 south in Boulder City. NV-173 is a short highway that follows the former route of US-95 between Bus. US-93 and I-11 in Boulder City.

item.title: NV-173 South - Mile 1
item.description: Mile 1 in Clark County on NV-173 south

item.title: Bus. US-93 North at NV-173 to US-95 South
item.description: Bus. US-93 North at NV-173 to US-95 South in Boulder City. Turn left for access to US-95. This is the former intersection of US-93 and US-95, before being re-routed with the construction of I-11.

item.title: Bus. US-93 North at NV-173
item.description: Bus. US-93 North at NV-173 in Boulder City. Use exit for TO US-95 South/Searchlight. This was the former intersection of US-93 and US-95, which was moved south a short distance with the construction of I-11. A short connector highway, NV-173, connects this intersection with US-95 at I-11.

item.title: I-11 South - Exit 14
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 14 - US-95 South/Boulder City/Searchlight. US-95 south leaves I-11/US-93 here. Northbound US-95 joins US-93 north to I-15.
